com.netscape.cmstools

Class BtoA

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netscape.cmstools.BtoA

  • public class BtoA
extends java.lang.Object
    The BtoA class is a utility program designed to "translate" a BINARY BASE 64 encoded blob into an ASCII BASE 64 encoded blob. It assumes that the name of a data file is passed to the program via the command line, and that the contents contain a blob encoded in a BINARY BASE 64 format.

    The program may be invoked as follows: 

    
      BtoA <input filename> <output filename>

      NOTE:  <input filename>   must contain a BINARY
                                BASE 64 encoded blob

             <output filename>  contains an ASCII
                                BASE 64 encoded blob
    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$
